resources.string: Are you sure you want to reboot the device?\nAll unsaved data will be lost!
Are you sure you want to reboot the device into recovery mode?\nAll unsaved data will be lost!

"Are you sure you want to reboot the device into bootloader (fastboot) mode?
All unsaved data will be lost!

 WARNING:
This function will not work on Samsung devices!"
Are you sure you want to reboot the device into soft mode?\nAll unsaved data will be lost!

Are you sure you want to reboot the system in safe mode?
All unsaved data will be lost!

 WARNING:
You can't use your installed apps in safe mode!
Are you sure you want to power off the phone?\nAll unsaved data will be lost!
